idea-plugin.name: Bytecode Editor
idea-plugin.description:
Provides View | Edit Bytecode action for those who learns JVM internals. Based on ByteCode Viewer by JetBrains but is better:

  • it uses an editor tab instead of popup
  • it supports editing bytecode assembler (in Jasmin format) and assembling back into .class files.
  • it provides default hotkey for bytecode analysis: Ctrl+K, Ctrl+B

Based on modified Jasper (Java disassembler) and Jasmin (Java assembler).

It's a very gloomy tool. WIP.
